00126             function                set_add_limitations( $theAddLimitation )
00127             {
00128                   try
00129                   {
00130                         if( $this->AddLimitations === '1 = 1' )
00131                         {
00132                               $this->AddLimitations = $theAddLimitation;

00134                         else
00135                         {
00136                               throw( new Exception( '"AddLimitations" was already set' ) );
00137                         }
00138                   }

00167             function                unsafe_select( $Condition = '1 = 1' )
00168             {
00169                   try
00170                   {
00171                         $this->Database->query_as( DB_OBJECT );
00172                         
00173                         $Records = $this->Database->select( 
00174                               '*' , 
00175                               $this->NativeTable , 
00176                               "( $this->AddLimitations ) AND $Condition" 
00177                         );
00178                         
00179                         foreach( $Records as $k => $v )
00180                         {
00181                               $Records[ $k ]->permit = htmlspecialchars_decode( $Records[ $k ]->permit , ENT_QUOTES );
00182                               $Records[ $k ]->comment = htmlspecialchars_decode( $Records[ $k ]->comment , ENT_QUOTES );
00183                         }
00184                         
00185                         return( $Records );
00186                   }
00187                   catch( Exception $e )
00188                   {
00189                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00190                   }
00191             }

00215             function                get_permit_by_name( $Permit )
00216             {
00217                   try
00218                   {
00219                         $Permit = $this->Security->get( $Permit , 'command' );
00220                         
00221                         $Items = $this->unsafe_select( "( $this->AddLimitations ) AND permit LIKE '$Permit'" );
00222                         
00223                         if( count( $Items ) == 0 )
00224                         {
00225                               throw( new Exception( "Permit $Permit was not found" ) );
00226                         }
00227                         
00228                         return( $Items[ 0 ] );
00229                   }
00230                   catch( Exception $e )
00231                   {
00232                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00233                   }
00234             }

00309             function                create( $Record )
00310             {
00311                   try
00312                   {
00313                         $Record = $this->Security->parse_parameters( $Record , 'permit:command;comment:string' );
00314                         
00315                         list( $Fields , $Values ) = $this->DatabaseAlgorithms->compile_fields_values( $Record );
00316 
00317                         $id = $this->DatabaseAlgorithms->create( $this->NativeTable , $Fields , $Values );
00318                   }
00319                   catch( Exception $e )
00320                   {
00321                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00322                   }

00418             function                update( $id , $Record )
00419             {
00420                   try
00421                   {
00422                         $id = $this->Security->get( $id , 'integer_list' );
00423                         $Record = $this->Security->parse_parameters( 
00424                               $Record , 'permit:command;comment:string' , 'allow_not_set' 
00425                         );
00426                         
00427                         list( $Fields , $Values ) = $this->DatabaseAlgorithms->compile_fields_values( $Record );
00428                         
00429                         if( isset( $Fields[ 0 ] ) )
00430                         {
00431                               $this->Database->update( 
00432                                     $this->NativeTable , 
00433                                     $Fields , 
00434                                     $Values , 
00435                                     "( $this->AddLimitations ) AND id IN ( $id )" 
00436                               );
00437                               $this->Database->commit();
00438                         }
00439                   }
00440                   catch( Exception $e )
00441                   {
00442                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00443                   }
00444             }

00473             function                get_permits_for_page( $Object )
00474             {
00475                   try
00476                   {
00477                         $Object = $this->Security->get( $Object , 'string' );
00478 
00479                         if(  $this->CachedMultyFS->file_exists( dirname( __FILE__ )."/data/p$Object" ) )
00480                         {
00481                               $Permits = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( dirname( __FILE__ )."/data/p$Object" );
00482                               return( explode( ',' , $Permits ) );
00483                         }
00484                         else
00485                         {
00486                               return( array( 'admin' ) );
00487                         }
00488                   }
00489                   catch( Exception $e )

00595             function                get_permits_for_user( $uid )
00596             {
00597                   try
00598                   {
00599                         $uid = ( $uid === false ) ? $this->UserAlgorithms->get_id() : $this->Security->get( $uid , 'integer' );
00600 
00601                         $Links = $this->Link->get_links( $uid , false , 'user' , 'permit' );
00602                         
00603                         if( isset( $Links[ 0 ] ) === false )
00604                         {
00605                               return( array( 'public' ) );
00606                         }
00607                         else
00608                         {
00609                               $ids = get_field_ex( $Links , 'object2_id' );
00610                               $Permits = $this->select_list( implode( ',' , $ids ) );
00611                               
00612                               return( get_field_ex( $Permits , 'permit' ) );
00613                         }
00614                   }
00615                   catch( Exception $e )
00616                   {
00617                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00618                   }
00619             }

00643             function                get_permits_for_user_group( $uid )
00644             {
00645                   try
00646                   {
00647                         $uid = ( $uid === false ) ? $this->UserAlgorithms->get_id() : $this->Security->get( $uid , 'integer' );
00648 
00649                         $LinkType = $this->Link->get_link_type( 'user' , 'group' );
00650                         $this->Database->query_as( DB_OBJECT );
00651                         $Items = $this->Database->select( 
00652                               '`umx_group`.id' , 
00653                               '`umx_group` , umx_link' , 
00654                               "umx_group.id = umx_link.object2_id AND ".
00655                                     "umx_link.object1_id = $uid AND type = $LinkType" 
00656                         );
00657 
00658                         $Permits = array();
00659                         
00660                         foreach( $Items as $i )
00661                         {
00662                               $Permits = array_merge( $Permits , $this->get_permits_for_group( $i->id ) );
00663                         }
00664                         
00665                         return( array_unique( $Permits ) );
00666                   }
00667                   catch( Exception $e )
00668                   {
00669                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00670                   }
00671             }

00800             function                get_permits_for_group( $gid , $AddDefaultPermit = true )
00801             {
00802                   try
00803                   {
00804                         $gid = $this->Security->get( $gid , 'integer' );
00805                         
00806                         $Links = $this->Link->get_links( $gid , false , 'group' , 'permit' );
00807 
00808                         $ids = get_field_ex( $Links , 'object2_id' );
00809                         
00810                         if( count( $ids ) !== 0 )
00811                         {
00812                               $Permits = $this->select_list( implode( ',' , $ids ) );
00813                                     
00814                               return( get_field_ex( $Permits , 'permit' ) );
00815                         }
00816                         else
00817                         {
00818                               return( array() );
00819                         }
00820                   }
00821                   catch( Exception $e )
00822                   {
00823                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00824                   }

00853             function                add_permit_for_object( $Permit , $Object , $ObjectType = 'page' )
00854             {
00855                   try
00856                   {
00857                         /* dropping local cache */
00858                         $this->PermitsCache = array();
00859                   
00860                         $Permit = $this->Security->get( $Permit , 'command' );
00861                         $Object = $this->Security->get( $Object , 'string' );
00862                         $ObjectType = $this->Security->get( $ObjectType , 'command' );
00863                         
00864                         $Permits = array();
00865                   
00866                         if( $ObjectType == 'page' || $ObjectType == 'menu' )
00867                         {
00868                               $PermitFilePath = '';
00869                               $Prefix = $ObjectType == 'menu' ? 'm' : '';
00870                               $Prefix = $ObjectType == 'page' ? 'p' : $Prefix;
00871                               
00872                               $PermitFilePath = dirname( __FILE__ ).'/data/'.$Prefix.$Object;
00873       
00874                               $Permits = array();
00875       
00876                               if( file_exists( $PermitFilePath ) )
00877                               {
00878                                     $Permits = $DataManipulator->get_file_content( $PermitFilePath , ',' );
00879                                     $Permits = $Permits[ 0 ];
00880                               }
00881                               
00882                               if( array_search( $Permit , $Permits ) == false )
00883                               {
00884                                     $Permits [] = $Permit;
00885                                     $Permits = implode( ',' , $Permits );
00886                                     $this->CachedMultyFS->file_put_contents( $PermitFilePath , $Permits );
00887                               }
00888                         }
00889                         elseif( $ObjectType == 'user' || $ObjectType == 'group' )
00890                         {
00891                         
00892                               $Permit = $this->unsafe_select( "permit LIKE '$Permit'" );
00893                               $Permit = $Permit[ 0 ];
00894                               $this->Link->create_link( $Object , $Permit->id , $ObjectType , 'permit' , true );
00895                               return;
00896                         }
00897                   }
00898                   catch( Exception $e )
00899                   {
00900                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00901                   }
00902             }
00903

00931             {
00932                   try
00933                   {
00934                         /* dropping local cache */
00935                         $this->PermitsCache = array();

00940                         {

00982             function                toggle_permit_for_object( $Permit , $Object , $ObjectType = 'page' )
00983             {
00984                   try
00985                   {
00986                         /* dropping local cache */
00987                         $this->PermitsCache = array();
00988                   
00989                         $Permit = $this->Security->get( $Permit , 'command' );
00990                         $Permit = $this->unsafe_select( "permit LIKE '$Permit'" );
00991                         if( isset( $Permit[ 0 ] ) === false )
00992                         {
00993                               throw( new Exception( "Permit \"$Permit\" was not found" ) );
00994                         }
00995                         
00996                         $Permit = $Permit[ 0 ];
00997                         $Object = $this->Security->get( $Object , 'string' );
00998                         $ObjectType = $this->Security->get( $ObjectType , 'command' );
00999                         
01000                         if( is_array( $Object ) === false )
01001                         {
01002                               $Object = array( $Object );
01003                         }
01004                         
01005                         foreach( $Object as $i => $id )
01006                         {
01007                               if( $this->Link->link_exists( $id , get_field( $Permit , 'id' ) , $ObjectType , 'permit' ) )
01008                               {
01009                                     $this->Link->delete_link( $id , get_field( $Permit , 'id' ) , $ObjectType , 'permit' );
01010                               }
01011                               else
01012                               {
01013                                     $this->Link->create_link( $id , get_field( $Permit , 'id' ) , $ObjectType , 'permit' , true );
01014                               }
01015                         }
01016                   }
01017                   catch( Exception $e )
01018                   {
01019                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
01020                   }
01021             }

01242                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
01243                   }
01244             }
01245       }
